name: Pickleball Club
description:
# Sunway Pickleball Club

## 🏓 Fast, Fun, and Friendly
Pickleball is one of the fastest-growing sports globally, and now it's right here at Sunway! This club brings together students for casual and competitive pickleball matches.

## 🏅 Club Activities
- Weekly training sessions and mini-tournaments
- Beginner-friendly workshops
- Friendly matches with other universities and clubs

## 🤝 Join the Fun
No experience required — just grab a paddle and let's rally! Great for fitness, reflexes, and meeting new friends on the court.
